url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Trait Types

sections.body: These traits determine the laws of physics and nature on the plane, including how gravity and time function.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Trait Types/Physical Traits
sections.name: Physical Traits

sections.body: The dominance of particular elemental or energy forces is determined by these traits.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Trait Types/Elemental and Energy Traits
sections.name: Elemental and Energy Traits

sections.body: Just as characters may be lawful neutral or chaotic good, many planes are tied to a particular morality or ethos.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Trait Types/Alignment Traits
sections.name: Alignment Traits

sections.body: Magic works differently from plane to plane; magic traits set the boundaries for what magic can and can't do on each plane.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Trait Types/Magic Traits
sections.name: Magic Traits

name: Trait Types
